casebody.data:
In the Matter of Louis EPSTEIN, Trading as Hudson Paper Mills, Bankrupt; Louis J. Castellano, Appellant. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 1, 1926.) No. 35. Satterlee & Canfield, of New York City (R. Randolph Hicks, of New York City, of counsel), for trustee in bankruptcy. Bondy & Sehloss, of New York City (Eugene L. Bondy, of New York City, of counsel), for respondents Udell & Sons.

Before MANTON, HAND, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
